projects.title: CycleZen - Bicycle Store
projects.description: CycleZen is your go-to online store for top-quality bicycles, accessories, and gear. From road and mountain bikes to electric and hybrid options, we offer premium products at great prices. Enjoy a seamless shopping experience with secure payments and fast delivery. Ride smarter, ride greener—shop CycleZen today! This project is an Express.js application developed with TypeScript that integrates MongoDB using Mongoose to manage a comprehensive Bicycle Store. The application is designed to streamline inventory management, handle customer orders, and calculate revenue while ensuring data integrity through robust schema validation.
features: Create, read, update, and delete bicycles.
Create, read, update, and delete user accounts.
Create, read, update, and cancel customer orders.
Secure online payments via Shurjo Payment integration and Users can make payments via credit/debit cards or mobile Banking
Track inventory levels, manage stock, and generate reports.
Automatically calculate revenue based on sales and expenses.

technologies.frontend: React.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn, Redux, JWT

projects.title: Save Stella_3024
projects.description: Save Stella_3024 is an educational game created by Team Orbvengers for NASA's Space Apps Challenge 2024. Our game 'Save Stella_3024' is an educational game designed to raise environmental awareness. Players solve real-world ecological issues like pollution and climate change using GLOBE protocol data and machine learning. Set in a future Earth, players must restore balance by addressing crises in the Pedosphere (soil), Hydrosphere (water), Biosphere (living organisms), and Atmosphere (air). Real-time NASA Worldview mapping enhances gameplay with live environmental data. Learning about science can be a fun experience! Our Games that focus on science and environmental issues can create opportunities for players to develop their interests and gain knowledge while engaging with each other in a fun way.
features: NASA Worldview integration for live environmental data.
Machine learning to predict and solve environmental problems.
Engaging gameplay focused on ecological problem-solving.
Collaborate with others to tackle global challenges.
Monitor in-game progress with performance analytics.

technologies.machineLearning: Use multiple machine learning models to predict and solve environmental problems.

projects.title: Burger Hunter - Ultimate Burger Finder
projects.description: Burger Hunter is the ultimate platform for burger lovers! Discover the best burgers near you, browse menus, read reviews, and find exclusive deals on delicious burgers. Whether you're craving a classic cheeseburger or a gourmet specialty, Burger Hunter has got you covered.
features: Find the best-rated burgers near your location.
Explore detailed menus with ingredients and pricing.
Read and leave reviews for different burger joints.
Direct ordering from partnered restaurants.
GPS-powered search to find nearby burger spots.
Get access to discounts and exclusive burger deals.

projects.title: MyUniversity - Student Portal
projects.description: MyUniversity is a comprehensive student portal designed to streamline academic management. It allows students to view courses, track their progress, interact with faculty, and access university resources in one centralized platform.
features: User-friendly dashboard for students and faculty.
Course enrollment and progress tracking.
Digital library and resource access.
Announcements and event notifications.
Secure login and role-based access control.
Online assignment submission and grading system.

projects.title: Hotchpotch Innovations - Frontend Task
projects.description: A frontend task for Hotchpotch Innovations, implementing a dynamic and responsive UI using modern web technologies. The project focuses on an interactive user experience with smooth navigation, optimized performance, and modular components.
features: Responsive and visually appealing UI
State management using Redux for efficient data flow
API integration for dynamic content rendering
Reusable and modular component architecture
Optimized performance with lazy loading and code splitting
Dark mode toggle for enhanced accessibility

technologies.frontend: React.js, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, Tailwind CSS, Ant Design

projects.title: Everything Starts with water
projects.description: Everything Starts with Water is an educational and environmental awareness platform that highlights the importance of water conservation. The platform provides interactive content, real-world data, and community-driven initiatives to promote sustainable water management practices.
features: Interactive data visualizations on water usage
Educational resources on water conservation
Community forum for discussions and initiatives
Real-time updates on water quality and availability
User-friendly UI with responsive design
Dark mode for better accessibility

blogs.title: The Rise of Quantum Computing
blogs.description: Dive into the fascinating world of quantum computing, where traditional binary bits make way for qubits, unlocking unprecedented computational power. Explore the potential applications, challenges, and the race among tech giants to achieve quantum supremacy.

blogs.title: Augmented Reality: Bridging the Digital and Physical Worlds
blogs.description: Discover the transformative impact of augmented reality (AR) on various industries, from gaming and education to healthcare and manufacturing. Uncover the latest AR technologies, groundbreaking applications, and the future possibilities of this immersive tech.

blogs.title: The Blockchain Revolution: Beyond Cryptocurrencies
blogs.description: Explore the underlying technology of cryptocurrencies – blockchain – and its potential to revolutionize industries beyond finance. Delve into smart contracts, decentralized applications (DApps), and the growing adoption of blockchain in various sectors.

blogs.title: 5G and the Future of Connectivity
blogs.description: Uncover the promises and possibilities that 5G technology brings to the world. From lightning-fast internet speeds to enabling the Internet of Things (IoT), this blog explores the impact of 5G on communication, entertainment, and the connected future.

blogs.title: Artificial Intelligence: Shaping Tomorrow's World
blogs.description: Dive deep into the realm of artificial intelligence (AI) and its transformative influence on industries, society, and our daily lives. Explore machine learning, natural language processing, and the ethical considerations surrounding AI development.

blogs.title: Cybersecurity in the Digital Age
blogs.description: Navigate the evolving landscape of cybersecurity and the critical role it plays in safeguarding digital assets. From advanced threat detection to ethical hacking, this blog examines the strategies and technologies shaping the future of online security.
